common.buttons.getRelief.zh: 获取我的个性化缓解方案

common.disclaimer.en: This tool provides informational insights and is not a substitute for professional medical diagnosis or advice. Please consult a healthcare provider for any health concerns.
common.disclaimer.zh: 本工具提供的信息仅供参考，不能替代专业的医疗诊断或建议。如有任何健康问题，请咨询医疗保健提供者。

symptomAssessor.subtitle.en: Let's understand your unique pain profile. Your answers will help us create a personalized assessment.
symptomAssessor.subtitle.zh: 让我们了解您独特的疼痛特征。您的回答将帮助我们创建一份个性化的评估报告。

symptomAssessor.questions.painLevel.titl.en: On a typical day with period pain, how would you rate its intensity?
symptomAssessor.questions.painLevel.titl.zh: 在典型的痛经日，您如何评价疼痛的强度？

symptomAssessor.questions.painLevel.opti.en: Mild (1-3/10): It's noticeable but doesn't stop me from my daily activities.
symptomAssessor.questions.painLevel.opti.zh: 轻度 (1-3/10): 能感觉到，但不影响我的日常活动。

symptomAssessor.questions.painLevel.opti.en: Moderate (4-6/10): It's disruptive and affects my focus and productivity. I might need over-the-counter pain relief.
symptomAssessor.questions.painLevel.opti.zh: 中度 (4-6/10): 疼痛会干扰我，影响我的注意力和工作效率。可能需要非处方止痛药。

symptomAssessor.questions.painLevel.opti.en: Severe (7-8/10): The pain is strong enough that I need to lie down or stop what I'm doing. It's difficult to function.
symptomAssessor.questions.painLevel.opti.zh: 重度 (7-8/10): 疼痛很强烈，我需要躺下或停止正在做的事情，难以正常活动。

symptomAssessor.questions.painLevel.opti.en: Very Severe (9-10/10): The pain is debilitating and overwhelming. I'm often bedridden and may experience other symptoms like nausea or fainting.
symptomAssessor.questions.painLevel.opti.zh: 极重度 (9-10/10): 疼痛使人衰弱，难以忍受。我经常卧床不起，并可能伴有恶心或昏厥等其他症状。

symptomAssessor.questions.painDuration.t.en: How long does the most intense pain typically last?
symptomAssessor.questions.painDuration.t.zh: 最剧烈的疼痛通常会持续多久？

symptomAssessor.questions.painDuration.o.en: A few hours on the first day.
symptomAssessor.questions.painDuration.o.zh: 在第一天持续几个小时。

symptomAssessor.questions.painDuration.o.en: It's significant for the first 1-2 days of my period.
symptomAssessor.questions.painDuration.o.zh: 在经期的前1-2天内疼痛比较严重。

symptomAssessor.questions.painDuration.o.en: It persists for 3 or more days.
It's unpredictable and varies greatly from cycle to cycle.
symptomAssessor.questions.painDuration.o.zh: 疼痛不可预测，每个周期的差异很大。

symptomAssessor.questions.painLocation.t.en: Where do you primarily feel the pain? (Select all that apply)
symptomAssessor.questions.painLocation.t.zh: 您主要在哪个部位感到疼痛？（可多选）

symptomAssessor.questions.painLocation.o.en: A general, dull ache across the entire pelvic region
symptomAssessor.questions.painLocation.o.zh: 整个盆腔区域普遍的钝痛

symptomAssessor.questions.accompanyingSy.en: Besides pain, what other symptoms do you experience? (Select all that apply)
symptomAssessor.questions.accompanyingSy.zh: 除了疼痛，您还会经历哪些其他症状？（可多选）

impactAssessment.subtitle.en: To help us suggest the most suitable relief strategies, tell us what you're looking for.
impactAssessment.subtitle.zh: 为了帮助我们推荐最合适的缓解策略，请告诉我们您的需求。

impactAssessment.preference.title.en: What is your primary goal right now?
impactAssessment.preference.title.zh: 您目前的主要目标是什么？

impactAssessment.preference.options.inst.en: I need fast-acting relief for my current pain.
impactAssessment.preference.options.inst.zh: 我需要针对当前疼痛的快速缓解方法。

impactAssessment.preference.options.natu.en: I prefer natural or non-medicinal remedies.
impactAssessment.preference.options.natu.zh: 我更喜欢自然的或非药物的疗法。

impactAssessment.preference.options.long.en: I want to explore long-term management strategies to reduce future pain.
impactAssessment.preference.options.long.zh: 我想探索能够减少未来疼痛的长期管理策略。

impactAssessment.preference.options.medi.en: I'm open to learning about medical treatments and professional advice.
impactAssessment.preference.options.medi.zh: 我愿意了解相关的医疗方案和专业建议。

workplaceAssessment.subtitle.en: Understanding how your symptoms impact your work can help identify supportive measures.
workplaceAssessment.subtitle.zh: 了解您的症状如何影响工作，有助于找到有效的支持措施。

workplaceAssessment.questions.concentrat.en: How does your period pain affect your ability to concentrate at work or school?
workplaceAssessment.questions.concentrat.zh: 您的痛经如何影响您在工作或学习时的注意力？
对我的注意力没有影响。

workplaceAssessment.questions.concentrat.en: It's slightly distracting, but I can manage.
workplaceAssessment.questions.concentrat.zh: 会稍微分散注意力，但我能应付。

workplaceAssessment.questions.concentrat.en: It makes it very difficult to focus on tasks.
It's nearly impossible to concentrate or be productive.
workplaceAssessment.questions.concentrat.zh: 几乎无法集中注意力或保持工作效率。

workplaceAssessment.questions.absenteeis.en: Have you ever had to miss work, school, or important events because of your period symptoms?
workplaceAssessment.questions.absenteeis.zh: 您是否曾因经期症状而不得不缺勤、缺课或错过重要活动？

workplaceAssessment.questions.absenteeis.en: Rarely (e.g., once a year or less)
workplaceAssessment.questions.absenteeis.zh: 很少（例如，每年一次或更少）
经常（在大多数或所有周期中）

workplaceAssessment.questions.communicat.en: How comfortable would you feel discussing the need for accommodations (e.g., a short break, working from home) with your manager due to period pain?
workplaceAssessment.questions.communicat.zh: 如果因痛经需要向您的上司提出调整请求（例如，短暂休息、在家工作），您的自在程度如何？

workplaceAssessment.questions.communicat.en: Very comfortable, I believe they would be supportive.
workplaceAssessment.questions.communicat.zh: 非常自在，我相信他们会支持。

workplaceAssessment.questions.communicat.en: Hesitant, I'm not sure how they would react.
workplaceAssessment.questions.communicat.zh: 有些犹豫，不确定他们会作何反应。

workplaceAssessment.questions.communicat.en: Very uncomfortable, I would avoid the conversation.
workplaceAssessment.questions.communicat.zh: 非常不自在，我会避免进行这种沟通。

workplaceAssessment.questions.communicat.en: Not applicable / I don't have a manager.
workplaceAssessment.questions.communicat.zh: 不适用 / 我没有上司。

workplaceAssessment.questions.support.ti.en: What form of workplace support would be most beneficial for you during your period? (Select all that apply)
workplaceAssessment.questions.support.ti.zh: 在经期，哪种形式的工作场所支持对您最有益？（可多选）

workplaceAssessment.questions.support.op.en: Access to a quiet rest area
workplaceAssessment.questions.support.op.zh: 有安静的休息区可供使用

workplaceAssessment.questions.support.op.en: More open and understanding culture around menstrual health
workplaceAssessment.questions.support.op.zh: 对月经健康有更开放和理解的文化氛围
有明确的经期休假政策

workplaceAssessment.questions.support.op.en: I do not require any specific support.
workplaceAssessment.questions.support.op.zh: 我不需要任何特定的支持。

results.title.zh: 您的初步疼痛特征报告

results.emergencyAlertText.en: The symptoms you've described are severe and may indicate a condition requiring immediate medical attention. We strongly advise you to contact a healthcare professional or visit an emergency room.
results.emergencyAlertText.zh: 您所描述的症状较为严重，可能表明存在需要立即就医的健康问题。我们强烈建议您联系医疗专业人士或前往急诊室。

calculation.symptom.recs.mild.immediate1.en: Gentle stretching or a short walk
calculation.symptom.recs.mild.immediate1.zh: 温和的伸展运动或短途散步

calculation.symptom.recs.mild.longTerm1.en: Regular light exercise like yoga or pilates
calculation.symptom.recs.mild.longTerm1.zh: 定期进行瑜伽或普拉提等轻度运动

calculation.symptom.recs.moderate.immedi.en: Apply a heating pad to the abdomen or lower back
calculation.symptom.recs.moderate.immedi.zh: 在腹部或下背部加热敷垫

calculation.symptom.recs.moderate.immedi.en: Consider over-the-counter pain relievers (consult a doctor first)
calculation.symptom.recs.moderate.immedi.zh: 考虑使用非处方止痛药（请先咨询医生）

calculation.symptom.recs.moderate.longTe.en: Track your cycle to anticipate pain
calculation.symptom.recs.moderate.longTe.zh: 追踪您的周期以预测疼痛

calculation.symptom.recs.moderate.longTe.en: Explore dietary changes, like reducing caffeine and salt
calculation.symptom.recs.moderate.longTe.zh: 探索饮食调整，如减少咖啡因和盐分

calculation.symptom.recs.severe.immediat.en: Apply a heating pad and rest in a comfortable position
calculation.symptom.recs.severe.immediat.zh: 使用热敷垫并在舒适的位置休息

calculation.symptom.recs.severe.immediat.en: Use deep breathing or meditation techniques for acute pain
calculation.symptom.recs.severe.immediat.zh: 使用深呼吸或冥想技巧应对急性疼痛

calculation.symptom.recs.severe.longTerm.en: Consult a healthcare professional for diagnosis
calculation.symptom.recs.severe.longTerm.zh: 咨询医疗保健专业人员进行诊断

calculation.symptom.recs.severe.longTerm.en: Discuss long-term pain management strategies with a doctor
calculation.symptom.recs.severe.longTerm.zh: 与医生讨论长期疼痛管理策略

calculation.symptom.recs.prefs.natural.l.en: Incorporate anti-inflammatory foods into your diet (e.g., turmeric, leafy greens)
calculation.symptom.recs.prefs.natural.l.zh: 将抗炎食物（如姜黄、绿叶蔬菜）纳入饮食

calculation.symptom.recs.prefs.medical.l.en: Schedule a visit with a gynecologist to rule out underlying conditions like endometriosis or fibroids
calculation.symptom.recs.prefs.medical.l.zh: 预约妇科医生，以排除子宫内膜异位症或肌瘤等潜在疾病

calculation.workplace.suggestions.suppor.en: Your ability to work seems largely unaffected, and you feel comfortable communicating your needs. This is a great foundation.
calculation.workplace.suggestions.suppor.zh: 您的工作能力似乎基本未受影响，并且您能自在地沟通需求。这是一个很好的基础。

calculation.workplace.suggestions.adapti.en: Your work is moderately impacted. Identifying key support measures could significantly improve your experience.
calculation.workplace.suggestions.adapti.zh: 您的工作受到中等程度的影响。确定关键的支持措施可以显著改善您的体验。

calculation.workplace.suggestions.adapti.en: Consider having an informal chat with a trusted manager or HR representative about the challenges faced.
calculation.workplace.suggestions.adapti.zh: 考虑与信任的经理或人力资源代表进行非正式的交谈，讨论所面临的挑战。

calculation.workplace.suggestions.challe.en: Your symptoms significantly impact your work. It is important to find support.
calculation.workplace.suggestions.challe.zh: 您的症状严重影响了您的工作。寻求支持非常重要。

calculation.workplace.suggestions.challe.en: Start by documenting the impact on your work. Use our full report as a personal tool.
calculation.workplace.suggestions.challe.zh: 首先记录症状对工作的影响。将我们的完整报告作为个人工具。

calculation.workplace.suggestions.challe.en: Research your company’s existing sick leave and flexible work policies.
calculation.workplace.suggestions.challe.zh: 研究您公司现有的病假和弹性工作政策。

calculation.workplace.suggestions.commun.en: Practice framing conversations around work impact (e.g., "I am having a difficult health day and need to work from home to maintain my productivity") rather than personal details.
calculation.workplace.suggestions.commun.zh: 练习围绕工作影响来组织对话（例如，“我今天身体不适，需要在家工作以保持工作效率”），而不是个人细节。

calculation.workplace.suggestions.suppor.en: Based on your preferences, consider formally or informally requesting support, such as:
calculation.workplace.suggestions.suppor.zh: 根据您的偏好，考虑正式或非正式地请求支持，例如：

conversion.emailCapture.prompt.en: Get a detailed copy of your report and personalized tips sent to your inbox.
conversion.emailCapture.prompt.zh: 获取一份详细的报告副本和发送到您收件箱的个性化提示。

conversion.emailCapture.successMessage.en: Check your inbox for your personalized report.
conversion.emailCapture.successMessage.zh: 请检查您的收件箱，查收您的个性化报告。

conversion.hrConsultation.prompt.en: Ready to improve your workplace? Learn more about our solutions for businesses.
conversion.hrConsultation.prompt.zh: 准备好改善您的工作场所了吗？了解更多我们为企业提供的解决方案。
